Posts.EditableText:
Hello Squiffy Forums,

It has been a couple days, and it has come to my attention that despite providing the link to my Beta Game, _no one_ has followed the requirements that I had set for my game. Therefore this opportunity to be a Beta Tester and to be mentioned in-game has passed and is closed.
Posts.HTML:
Hello Squiffy Forums,

It has been a couple days, and it has come to my attention that despite providing the link to my Beta Game, no one has followed the requirements that I had set for my game. Therefore this opportunity to be a Beta Tester and to be mentioned in-game has passed and is closed.
